verbose_text: Acquisition of psychostimulant CPP is inhibited by mGluR1 or NMDA blockade in the VTA, while CPP expression is attenuated by NMDA, but not mGluR1, antagonism in the VTA, supporting the potential role of LTP-NMDA in driving CPP.
evidence: mGluR1, antagonism in the VTA              , supporting the potential role of LTP-NMDA
